full_summary:
### Procurement Notice

**Tender Number:** WS4474211430
**Title:** Hoof Trim Chute 
**Region of Delivery:** Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada

**Procurement Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a hoof trim chute to be used by the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food. The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Solicitation Details**

- **Solicitation Number:** WS4474211430
- **Publication Date:** 2024-07-09
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-25T14:00:00
- **Deadline for Questions:** N/A

**Scope of Work**

The scope of this solicitation involves the procurement of a hoof trim chute, including delivery and training. The equipment is to be located in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada, as specified in the Annex Statement of Requirement.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder.

**Notice URL**

The complete solicitation package, including the Annex Statement of Requirement, can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20266942?extsite=MjAyNjY5NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20266942?extsite=MjAyNjY5NDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Point of Contact**

Adjakly, Efoé (SPAC/PSPC)
Efoé.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Please Note**

The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the contract to bid on this project. Failure to do so may result in their proposal being disqualified.
